subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: With one race to go, Jimmie Johnson solidified his spot atop the Nextel Cup standings with a second-place finish behind Kevin Harvick at the Checker Auto Parts 500 on Sunday.
snippet: With one race to go, Jimmie Johnson solidified his spot atop the Nextel Cup standings with a second-place finish behind Kevin Harvick at the Checker Auto Parts 500 on Sunday.
